Package Graph

Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
Graph.Vertex
public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Vertex()
    This constructor creates a Vertex object containing the color of a node and an array containing it's connected vertices NB: v.connected[i] is the i+1 vertex (they start at 1 but are stored from 0).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addElemToCon​(int toAdd)
    Setter of the connected array of a Vertex, adds one element to the array
    int getColor()
    Getter of the colour of a Vertex
    int[] getConnected()
    Getter of the connected array of a Vertex
    int getDegree()
    Getter returning the degree of a node
    void removeConnectionWith​(int[] vertex)
    Modifier of the connections
    void setColor​(int col)
    Setter of the colour of a Vertex, checks the validity the color before assigning the colour.
    void setConnected​(int[] connected)
    Setter of the connected array of a Vertex, as a global array

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Vertex

      public Vertex()
      This constructor creates a Vertex object containing the color of a node and an array containing it's connected vertices NB: v.connected[i] is the i+1 vertex (they start at 1 but are stored from 0).

  • Method Details

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(int col)
      Setter of the colour of a Vertex, checks the validity the color before assigning the colour.
      Parameters:
      col - int, color to assign

    • addElemToCon

      public void addElemToCon​(int toAdd)
      Setter of the connected array of a Vertex, adds one element to the array
      Parameters:
      toAdd - int, element to add

    • getColor

      public int getColor()
      Getter of the colour of a Vertex
      Returns:
      color, an int, the value of the id of the colour

    • getConnected

      public int[] getConnected()
      Getter of the connected array of a Vertex
      Returns:
      an int array, containing the values of the connected vertices

    • getDegree

      public int getDegree()
      Getter returning the degree of a node
      Returns:
      the degree of a node

    • removeConnectionWith

      public void removeConnectionWith​(int[] vertex)
      Modifier of the connections
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertices to isolate as -1 in an array

    • setConnected

      public void setConnected​(int[] connected)
      Setter of the connected array of a Vertex, as a global array
      Parameters:
      connected - new connection array
